messages.content: Ryan Stephenson for Leeds North East STANDING WITH THERESA MAY

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Ryan's Five-Point Plan for Leeds North East
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1. More school places; 2. Extra funding for our NHS; 3. Delivering Brexit; 4. Strengthening job and skills; 5. Support for local businesses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Your choice at this election: Theresa May strong, stable leadership in the national interest OR A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
issues.economy: Securing our economic future. Shock win: Brexit: Europe stunned by UK leave vote.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am asking for your support as your local candidate to deliver for the first time in this seat the promise of more job opportunities for local people, better resources for our schools and positive representation in your area.

politicalExperience.achievements: worked to reveal chronic homelessness in our city, highlighting Labour Council's failings.

images.caption: Theresa May strong, stable leadership in the national interest
